parties.name: Brightcast LLC

offerAndAcceptance.offer: Engagement of Company to provide media buying services.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Subject to the terms and conditions of the Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties agree to the terms outlined.

consideration.description: Revenue share based on ad revenues from Oath.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties have intention to create legal relations by signing this agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: Legal engagement in media buying services.
contract.consent: Implied consent from both parties agreeing to the terms.

durationAndTermination.duration: Indefinite until terminated by either party with a 30-day written notice.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Immediate termination for breach of agreement.
